footer.aboutDescription: Open-source, community-focused event management and ticketing platform.
footer.cookieNotice: This website uses only essential technical cookies necessary for authentication, session management, and invitation handling. We do not use tracking or analytics cookies.

home.tagline: Open-source, community-focused event management and ticketing platform. Discover events, connect with communities, and create unforgettable experiences.
home.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Log in
home.discoverEventsDescription: Find events happening in your community. From concerts to workshops, there's something for everyone.
home.buildCommunityDescription: Create organizations, host events, and grow your community with powerful management tools.
home.safeSecureDescription: Screen attendees with questionnaires. Secure ticketing, privacy-focused, and built with trust in mind.
home.tryDemoDescription: Explore Revel with test accounts and data. Experience the platform as both an organizer and an attendee.
home.tryDemoNote: Note: The demo runs on slow hardware and may take a moment to load.
home.keywords: events, community, ticketing, RSVP, event management, event platform
home.useCasesDescription: Revel is designed with diverse communities in mind. Whether you're organizing queer events, kink parties, or simply want more control over your data.
home.useCaseQueerDescription: Safe spaces for LGBTQ+ communities with privacy-first ticketing and screening.
home.useCaseKinkDescription: Discreet ticketing for adult events with questionnaire-based vetting.
home.useCasePrivacyDescription: GDPR-compliant, European-hosted, with full data ownership.
home.useCaseSelfHostedDescription: MIT licensed. Run on your own infrastructure with zero platform fees.
home.useCaseEventbriteDescription: Lower fees, more features, and you keep your data.
home.useCaseCommunityDescription: Build communities with membership tiers, potluck coordination, and more.

telegram.heading: Telegram
telegram.description: Connect your Telegram account to receive event notifications
telegram.status_connectedDescription: You'll receive event updates and notifications via Telegram
telegram.notConnected_description: Connect your Telegram account to stay updated with event notifications, reminders, and instant updates directly in Telegram.

telegram.connect_errorGeneric: Failed to connect Telegram account. Please try again.

security.heading: Security Settings
security.subheading: Manage your account security and two-factor authentication
security.twoFactorAuth_description: Add an extra layer of security to your account using a TOTP authenticator app
security.setupFlow_step1_description: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, 1Password, etc.)
security.setupFlow_manualEntry_hint: Enter this code in your app:
security.setupFlow_step2_description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to verify
security.disableFlow_description: Enter your current 6-digit code from your authenticator app to disable 2FA. This will make your account less secure.
security.securityTips_tip1: Use a strong, unique password for your Revel account
security.securityTips_tip2: Enable 2FA for an extra layer of security
security.securityTips_tip3: Never share your authentication codes with anyone
security.securityTips_tip4: Keep your authenticator app backed up securely

privacy.pageDescription: Manage your privacy settings and data on Revel
privacy.heading: Privacy & Data
privacy.subheading: Manage your privacy settings and exercise your data rights
privacy.dataExport_description: Request a complete copy of your Revel data in JSON format. This includes your profile, event history, RSVPs, and organization memberships.
privacy.dataExport_successDescription: We'll email you a download link when your data export is ready. This usually takes a few minutes.
privacy.dataExport_hint: You can request a data export once every 24 hours
privacy.accountDeletion_description: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. All your data will be permanently removed and cannot be recovered.
privacy.accountDeletion_deletedItem4: Organization memberships (if you're not an owner)
privacy.deletionModal_description: This action cannot be undone. We'll send you a confirmation email to verify this request.
privacy.deletionModal_willBeDeletedLabel: The following will be permanently deleted:
privacy.deletionModal_confirmationCheckbox: I understand this action is permanent and cannot be reversed
privacy.deletionSuccess_message: We've sent a confirmation email to your registered email address. Click the link in the email to permanently delete your account. The link will expire in 24 hours.
privacy.deletionSuccess_warning: If you didn't request this, you can safely ignore the email and your account will not be deleted.

settings.cascadeSettings_description: Check this to apply these settings to all your organization, series, and event-specific preferences. This will override any custom preferences you've set.

detailsStep.addressVisibilityPublic: Public - Anyone can see the address
detailsStep.addressVisibilityHint: Controls who can see the event address. Useful for private venues.
detailsStep.rsvpDeadlineHint: Last date and time to RSVP (timezone: {timezone})
detailsStep.waitlistHint: Allow users to join a waitlist when event is full
detailsStep.checkinClosesAtHint: When ticket check-in is no longer available (timezone: {timezone})
detailsStep.potluckHint: Allow attendees to create and claim items to bring
detailsStep.invitationRequestHint: Allow users to request invitations to this event
detailsStep.saveToAssignQuestionnaires: Save the event first to assign questionnaires
detailsStep.logoHint: Recommended: Square image, at least 400x400px. Used in metadata, small badges, and as fallback when no cover art is set. Falls back to organization logo if not set.
detailsStep.coverArtHint: Recommended: 16:9 aspect ratio, at least 1200x675px. Main visual for event cards and detail pages. Logo is used as fallback if not set. Falls back to organization cover if not set.
detailsStep.requireFullProfileHint: Attendees must have a profile picture, name, and pronouns to RSVP or purchase tickets
detailsStep.applicationDeadlineHint: Deadline for submitting invitation requests or questionnaires. Timezone: {timezone}
detailsStep.canAttendWithoutLoginHint: Allow users without an account to RSVP or purchase tickets
detailsStep.mapsHelpStep1: Open your location in Google Maps (or another maps service)
detailsStep.mapsHelpStep3: Copy the link and paste it in the "Maps Link" field below
detailsStep.mapsHelpStep4: For the embedded map: click "Embed a map", copy the entire HTML code, and paste it below
detailsStep.mapsUrlHint: The shareable link to the location. Attendees can click this to open the map.
detailsStep.mapsEmbedHint: Paste the full <iframe> embed code from "Embed a map". This shows an interactive map on your event page.

SFwESEssentialsStep.clearDescriptiveName: Choose a clear, descriptive name for your event

ineligibilityMessage.questionnaireNotPassedExplanation: Your questionnaire didn't meet the requirements. You can try again.

ineligibilityMessage.registrationNotOpenExplanation: RSVPs aren't open yet. Check back when registration begins.

ineligibilityMessage.soldOutExplanation: All tickets have been sold. Check back later for additional releases.
ineligibilityMessage.rsvpDeadlinePassedExplanation: The deadline to RSVP has passed. Late RSVPs are not accepted.

ineligibilityMessage.completeProfileExplanation: This event requires you to have a complete profile to attend.

accountPrivacyPage.pageDescription: Manage your privacy settings and data on Revel
accountPrivacyPage.title: Privacy & Data
accountPrivacyPage.subtitle: Manage your privacy settings and exercise your data rights
accountPrivacyPage.deletionEmailBody: We've sent a confirmation email to your registered email address. Click the link in the email to permanently delete your account. The link will expire in 24 hours.
accountPrivacyPage.deletionEmailIgnore: If you didn't request this, you can safely ignore the email and your account will not be deleted.
accountPrivacyPage.exportDataDescription: Request a complete copy of your Revel data in JSON format. This includes your profile, event history, RSVPs, and organization memberships.
accountPrivacyPage.exportRequestBody: We'll email you a download link when your data export is ready. This usually takes a few minutes.
accountPrivacyPage.exportLimitNote: You can request a data export once every 24 hours
accountPrivacyPage.yourFilesDescription: Files you've uploaded to questionnaire responses and other features. You can view and manage all your uploaded files here.
accountPrivacyPage.filesLoadError: Failed to load your files. Please try again later.
accountPrivacyPage.noFilesDescription: Files you upload to questionnaire responses will appear here.
accountPrivacyPage.fileDeleteModal_description: This action cannot be undone. The file will be permanently removed from your account.
accountPrivacyPage.fileDeleteModal_warning: Warning: If this file is used in a questionnaire submission that hasn't been reviewed yet, deleting it may affect your application.
accountPrivacyPage.deletionWarning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. All your data will be permanently removed and cannot be recovered.
accountPrivacyPage.delete_memberships: Organization memberships (if you're not an owner)
accountPrivacyPage.confirmDeletionMessage: This action cannot be undone. We'll send you a confirmation email to verify this request.
accountPrivacyPage.followingWillBeDeleted: The following will be permanently deleted:
accountPrivacyPage.confirmCheckboxLabel: I understand that this action is permanent and cannot be undone
accountPrivacyPage.dangerZoneWarning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. All your data will be permanently removed and cannot be recovered.
accountPrivacyPage.modal_description: This action cannot be undone. We'll send you a confirmation email to verify this request.
accountPrivacyPage.modal_listTitle: The following will be permanently deleted:
accountPrivacyPage.modal_confirmLabel: I understand this action is permanent and cannot be reversed

accountSecurityPage.title: Security Settings
accountSecurityPage.subtitle: Manage your account security and two-factor authentication
accountSecurityPage.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account using a TOTP authenticator app
accountSecurityPage.step1Description: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, 1Password, etc.)
accountSecurityPage.enterCodeManually: Enter this code in your app:
accountSecurityPage.step2Description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to verify
accountSecurityPage.disableDescription: Enter your current 6-digit code from your authenticator app to disable 2FA. This will make your account less secure.
accountSecurityPage.tip1: Use a strong, unique password for your Revel account
accountSecurityPage.tip2: Enable 2FA for an extra layer of security
accountSecurityPage.tip3: Never share your authentication codes with anyone
accountSecurityPage.tip4: Keep your authenticator app backed up securely
accountSecurityPage.passwordChangeDescription: Request a password reset link to change your password
accountSecurityPage.requestPasswordResetDescription: We'll send a password reset link to your email address. Click the link to set a new password.
accountSecurityPage.emailWillBeSent: A password reset link will be sent to {email}
accountSecurityPage.checkEmailInbox: Check your email inbox for the password reset link.
accountSecurityPage.toast_passwordResetFailed: Failed to send password reset link. Please try again.

accountSettingsPage.subtitle: Manage your preferences and notification settings

general.title: General Preferences

accountSettingsPage.privacyDescription: Control who can see you on event attendee lists

accountSettingsPage.eventRemindersDescription: Get reminded about upcoming events you're attending
accountSettingsPage.silenceAllDescription: Disable all email and push notifications
accountSettingsPage.locationDescription: Set your preferred city for event recommendations
accountSettingsPage.cascadeDescription: Check this to apply these settings to all your organization, series, and event-specific preferences. This will override any custom preferences you've set.
accountSettingsPage.errorNotLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view settings.

notificationPreferences.silenceAllDescription: Turn off all notifications. When enabled, all other settings will be disabled.
notificationPreferences.eventRemindersDescription: Receive reminders 14, 7, and 1 day before events you're attending
notificationPreferences.selectAtLeastOneChannel: Please select at least one notification channel
notificationPreferences.digestFrequencyDescription: Choose how frequently to receive notification digests
notificationPreferences.sendTimeDescription: Time of day to receive your digest (24-hour format)
notificationPreferences.invalidTimeFormat: Please enter a valid time in HH:MM format (e.g., 09:00)
notificationPreferences.visibilityToInvitees: Visible to other invitees at same event
notificationPreferences.visibilityDescription: Choose who can see you on event attendee lists
notificationPreferences.perTypeSettingsDefault: Types marked "Using defaults" follow the global channel settings above
notificationPreferences.perTypeSettingsCustom: Types with "Custom" settings use their own channel configuration
notificationPreferences.perTypeSettingsReset: Use "Reset" button to revert to default behavior

notificationList.markAllReadError: Failed to mark all as read
notificationList.noUnreadDescription: All caught up! No new notifications to read.
notificationList.emptyDescription: You'll see notifications here when you receive them.
notificationList.errorMessage: Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.

unsubscribePage.pageDescription: Manage your notification preferences to reduce email notifications
unsubscribePage.invalidTokenDescription: This unsubscribe link is invalid or has expired. Please check your email for a valid link or log in to manage your preferences.
unsubscribePage.successDescription: Your notification preferences have been updated successfully. You will only receive in-app notifications from now on.
unsubscribePage.title: Unsubscribe from Notifications
unsubscribePage.subtitle: We understand email notifications can be overwhelming. Adjust your preferences below to stay informed through in-app notifications only, or customize exactly what you want to receive.

questionnaireNewPage.basicInfoDescription: Set up the questionnaire name and type

questionnaireNewPage.type_generic_description: General purpose questionnaire for any use case

questionnaireNewPage.evalMode_automatic_description: AI evaluates all responses automatically - fastest approval process
questionnaireNewPage.evalMode_manual_description: Staff manually reviews all submissions - complete control over decisions
questionnaireNewPage.evalMode_hybrid_description: AI pre-scores responses, staff makes final approval decision

warning.title: Questions cannot be edited after creation
warning.description: To preserve submission integrity, you can only edit the questionnaire name, type, and settings. Questions and their structure are read-only. If you need to change questions, create a new questionnaire.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings

advanced.shuffleSectionsDescription: Randomize section order for each submission

learnMore.metaTitle: Learn More About Revel - Community Event Management Platform
learnMore.metaDescription: Discover Revel's powerful features: event management, ticketing, questionnaire screening, potluck coordination, and community building tools. Open-source and privacy-focused.
learnMore.heroTitle: Everything You Need to Build & Manage Communities
learnMore.heroSubtitle: Revel combines powerful event management with community-building tools in one free, open-source platform. From ticketing to attendee screening, potluck coordination to privacy controls.
learnMore.eventManagementDescription: Create single events or recurring series with complete control over visibility, capacity, and access.
learnMore.ticketingDescription: Multiple ticket tiers with flexible pricing strategies and integrated payment processing. Or simple RSVP.
learnMore.ticketingFeature2: Manage offline payments yourself or easily enable card payments with Stripe
learnMore.ticketingFeature3: Link ticket tiers to membership tiers for exclusive access
learnMore.questionnaireDescription: Build custom questionnaires to screen attendees and ensure your events remain safe and aligned with your community values.
learnMore.questionnaireFeature1: Custom questionnaires with manual or automatic scoring
learnMore.questionnaireFeature2: Optional AI-powered evaluation for free text responses
learnMore.questionnaireFeature3: Manual review workflow with approval system
learnMore.communityDescription: Create organizations with membership tiers, roles, and permissions to grow engaged communities.
learnMore.communityFeature2: Membership tiers with different access levels
learnMore.potluckDescription: Coordinate shared meals effortlessly with item assignment and dietary preference tracking.
learnMore.potluckFeature3: Dietary restrictions and preferences management, with privacy in mind
learnMore.privacyDescription: GDPR-compliant platform with data ownership, export capabilities, and security-first design.
learnMore.privacyFeature1: Complete data export and account deletion
learnMore.notificationsDescription: Stay informed with in-app, email, and Telegram notifications. Granular controls let you customize what you receive.
learnMore.multiLanguageDescription: Available in English, German, and Italian with more languages coming soon.
learnMore.venueManagementDescription: Define venues with sectors, rows, and individual seats. Assign seating to ticket tiers for reserved seating events.
learnMore.openSourceDescription: Revel is free and open-source under the MIT license. Self-host for complete control, or use our hosted version. No vendor lock-in, no hidden fees.
learnMore.betaAccessTitle: Join the Beta as an Organizer
learnMore.betaAccessDescription: Help us shape the future of community event management. Request beta access to test Revel as an organizer and provide valuable feedback.
learnMore.betaAccessNote: We'll respond within 24-48 hours with next steps.
learnMore.pricingDescription: Revel is completely free to use. Self-host for zero cost, or use our hosted version.
learnMore.pricingSelfManagedDescription: Manage offline payments yourself - no fees
learnMore.pricingSelfHostingDescription: Completely free and open-source - even for card payments
learnMore.pricingOnlinePaymentsDescription: 1.5% + â‚¬0.25 per ticket. Plus Stripe fees: 1.5% + â‚¬0.25 (EEA cards) or 2.5% + â‚¬0.25 (UK cards).
learnMore.ticketingFeature4: QR code check-in and ticket validation

feeCalculator.title: Fee Calculator
feeCalculator.creditCardFeesDescription: 1.5% + â‚¬0.25 per transaction. These go to Stripe - we have no control over them.
feeCalculator.platformFeeDescription: 1.5% + â‚¬0.25 per transaction. This goes to Revel to keep the lights on.

learnMore.startOrganizingDescription: Create your organization and start hosting amazing events for your community.
learnMore.startOrganizingNote: Free to get started. No credit card required.
orgCreate.pageDescription: Create your organization to start hosting events
orgCreate.title: Create Your Organization
orgCreate.subtitle: Start your journey as an event organizer by creating your organization.
orgCreate.form.name: Organization Name
orgCreate.form.nameHint: This name will be visible to all users browsing events.
orgCreate.form.contactEmailVerificationN: This email will need to be verified. We'll send you a verification link.
orgCreate.form.contactEmailAutoVerified: Using your verified email - no additional verification needed.
orgCreate.form.descriptionHint: A brief description of your organization and what events you host.
orgCreate.alreadyOwnerDescription: Each user can only own one organization. You can manage your existing organization from the dashboard.
orgCreate.emailNotVerifiedDescription: You must verify your email address before creating an organization. Please check your inbox for the verification email.
orgCreate.confirm.title: Confirm Organization Creation
orgCreate.confirm.warning: âš ï¸ The organization name cannot be changed after creation.
orgVerifyContactEmail.verifyingDescripti: Please wait while we verify your contact email.
orgVerifyContactEmail.successDescription: The contact email for {organizationName} has been successfully verified.
orgVerifyContactEmail.failureDescription: We could not verify your contact email. The link may have expired or is invalid.
orgVerifyContactEmail.linkExpired: The verification link may have expired or is invalid.

stripeConnectModal.title: Connect with Stripe
stripeConnectModal.description: To accept payments through Stripe, we need the official email address your organization uses for business communications. This will be used to create or link your Stripe account.
stripeConnectModal.emailHelp: This email will be used to create your Stripe account and receive important payment notifications.
stripeConnectModal.additionalInfo: If your organization already has a Stripe account setup in progress, we'll use this email to continue where you left off.

orgAdmin.venues.error.title: Error loading venues
orgAdmin.venues.error.description: Failed to load venues. Please try again.
orgAdmin.venues.empty.title: No venues yet
orgAdmin.venues.empty.description: Create your first venue to get started.
orgAdmin.venues.form.capacityHelp: Optional. Leave empty if capacity is determined by sectors.
orgAdmin.venues.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this venue? This will also delete all sectors and seats.
orgAdmin.sectors.pageDescription: Manage sectors and seating for this venue
orgAdmin.sectors.error.title: Error loading sectors
orgAdmin.sectors.error.description: Failed to load sectors. Please try again.
orgAdmin.sectors.empty.title: No sectors yet
orgAdmin.sectors.empty.description: Add sectors to define different areas of your venue (e.g., Orchestra, Balcony, VIP).
orgAdmin.sectors.form.codeHelp: Optional short code for seat labels
orgAdmin.sectors.form.capacityHelp: Optional. Calculated from seats if not set.
orgAdmin.sectors.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this sector? This will also delete all seats.
orgAdmin.seats.pageDescription: Configure seating layout for this sector
orgAdmin.seats.error.title: Error loading seats
orgAdmin.seats.error.description: Failed to load seats. Please try again.
orgAdmin.seats.empty.title: No seats configured
orgAdmin.seats.empty.description: Use the grid editor to add seats to this sector.
orgAdmin.seats.grid.title: Seat Grid Editor
orgAdmin.seats.grid.description: Click cells to add or remove seats. Drag to select multiple.
orgAdmin.seats.properties.title: Seat Properties
orgAdmin.seats.properties.obstructedHelp: Seat has limited or obstructed view
orgAdmin.seats.legend.title: Legend

venueSelector.label: Venue
venueSelector.help: Select the venue where this event will be held

ticketingStep.maxTicketsPerUserHint: Set the maximum number of tickets a single user can purchase for this event. Minimum 1. This can be overridden on individual ticket tiers.
eventPage.ticketReserved: Ticket(s) reserved! Complete payment as instructed.
eventPage.ticketReservedDesc: View your ticket for payment details.
eventPage.resumePaymentFailedDesc: The checkout session may have expired. Please try purchasing again.
eventPage.reservationCancelledDesc: Your ticket reservation has been cancelled.
eventPage.cancelReservationFailedDesc: Please try again or contact support.
tierForm.seatingConfig.noVenueConfigured: To enable seat assignment, configure a venue for this event in Basic Info.
tierForm.seatingConfig.venueFromEvent: Venue is set at the event level in Basic Info.

requestWhitelistButton.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to request verification
requestWhitelistButton.requestSubmittedBody: Your verification request has been submitted. The organization admins will review it and notify you when it's approved.
requestWhitelistButton.submitRequestToOrg: Submit a verification request to {organizationName}. This is required because your contact information matches a blocked entry.
requestWhitelistButton.submitRequestDescription: Submit a verification request to access this organization's events.
requestWhitelistButton.messagePlaceholder: Explain why you should be verified (e.g., how the organizers know you)...
requestWhitelistButton.failedToSubmitTryAgain: Failed to submit request. Please try again.

blacklistPage.title: Blacklist & Verification
blacklistPage.description: Manage blocked contacts and verification requests
blacklistPage.noEntriesDescription: Add contacts to block them from your organization
blacklistPage.noPendingRequestsDescription: Verification requests will appear here when users request access
blacklistPage.noVerifiedUsersDescription: Approved verification requests will appear here
blacklistPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by email, phone, or name...
blacklistPage.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
blacklistPage.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this user from the verified list?

blacklistModal.name: Name (for reference)
blacklistModal.reasonPlaceholder: Why is this person being blocked?
blacklistModal.atLeastOneRequired: At least one contact method is required

impersonatePage.title: Impersonation
impersonatePage.missingTokenHelp: You may have arrived at this page directly. Please initiate impersonation from the admin panel.
impersonatePage.invalidTokenHelp: The impersonation token has expired or has already been used. Please initiate a new impersonation session from the admin panel.
impersonatePage.forbiddenHelp: The user you are trying to impersonate may have been granted staff or superuser privileges since the impersonation was initiated.
impersonatePage.genericHelp: Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.

impersonationBanner.title: Impersonation Mode
impersonationBanner.notice: You are viewing this application as another user. All actions will be logged and attributed to the impersonated user.

fileUploader.clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop
